thread.title: See Jennifer Nettles Concert in Atlanta and Stay at Holiday Inn Express & Suites Atlanta North Perimeter
thread.title_full: See Jennifer Nettles Concert in Atlanta and Stay at Holiday Inn Express & Suites Atlanta North Perimeter - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: See Jennifer Nettles Concert in Atlanta and Stay at Holiday Inn Express & Suites Atlanta North Perimeter
text:
Holiday Inn Express & Suites Atlanta North Perimeter hotel offers affordable accommodations for the Jennifer Nettles concert in Atlanta on October 23, 2015.
 ATLANTA, GA, October 17, Country music fans attending the Jennifer Nettles concert in Atlanta will find affordable accommodations at the Holiday Inn Express & Suites Perimeter Center hotel North in Sandy Springs. The country superstar's 'Playing with Fire Tour' will kick off its twenty cities run at the Cobb Energy Performing Arts Centre on October 23. Special musical guests will be Brandy Clark and Ryan Kinder.
"We are happy to welcome guests attending the Jennifer Nettles concert," shares Shabbir Lightwala, General Manager at the Holiday Inn Express & Suites Atlanta North Perimeter. "Our Perimeter hotel is located just minutes from the Cobb Energy Performing Arts Centre, one of Atlanta's most popular music venues," explains Lightwala.
Guests at the Holiday Inn Express & Suites Atlanta North Perimeter will find comfortable rooms with free high speed Internet and Simply Smart beds with a choice of pillows. Travelers anticipating a longer stay will find the Extended Stay suites to be a great option. Suites offer the convenience of a kitchen with microwave, refrigerator, and dishwasher. Outstanding amenities at this property include a seasonal outdoor pool, fitness room, business center, and free garage parking. The complimentary Express Start Breakfast Bar, with a variety of healthy choices, is the perfect way to start the day. The Holiday Inn Express & Suites Atlanta North Perimeter is close to upscale shopping and dining in the Perimeter Center area. The hotel offers free weekday shuttle transportation within a 3-mile radius including Perimeter Mall and the Dunwoody MARTA Station.
Current specials at this Atlanta Perimeter hotel include the Romantic Escape Package. IHG Rewards Club members will earn points toward free hotel nights. AAA and senior discounts are available. The Holiday Inn Express & Suites Atlanta North Perimeter is located on Hammond Drive, near the junction of I-285 and GA 400.
 about the Jennifer Nettles 'Playing with Fire Tour' in Atlanta, visit www.cobbenergycentre.com . To book your stay at the Holiday Inn Express & Suites Atlanta North Perimeter, call 404-250-4450 or visit www.PERIMETERHOTEL.com .
About Holiday Inn Express Hotel & Suites Atlanta North-Perimeter/Dunwoody
The Holiday Inn Express Hotel & Suites Atlanta North-Perimeter/Dunwoody is directly off Georgia 400 and I-285. This means they're just minutes from several corporate offices and training centers. Additionally, Buckhead, Sandy Springs, Roswell, the Dunwoody Medical Centers, Northside Hospital, Children's Health Care, St. Joseph's, and the Dunwoody MARTA station are nearby. Enjoy a memorable stay at our modern Perimeter hotel, part of Atlanta's upscale corporate Perimeter Center. With our courteous staff, reasonable rates, and terrific amenities, this Atlanta Perimeter hotel is the place to "Stay Smart" in the Perimeter Center area.
 visit: http://www.PERIMETERHOTEL.com
